creator: hlhalo
descriptionHtml:
About this app

Lightchat is a voice entertainment community dedicated to global users

Welcome to chat parties lightchat!

Lightchat is a voice entertainment community dedicated to global users who enjoy party.

You do not need to show your face in lightchat, you can participate in various social chats and interactive games with your voice, here where you can meet people from thousands of different places, find same-minded people and become friends, here you may start your story. Every moment here can bring you happiness, because lightchat is an integrated entertainment party APP.

FEATURES:

[Contact all the world]
We cover global network and let you talk with a lot of interesting people easily.

[Your own voice room]
Enjoy the voice chat in your own room and share your room with others.

[Multiple fun activities]
Here are many funny activities, such as sing, game.

[Wonderful gifts]
Variety of exquisite gifts, luxury sports cars, beautiful avatar frame and other decorations to choose.

Dear friends, your comments and suggestions are very welcomed, please email us at: thousxepon@gmail.com
descriptionShort: Sweet talk with your soulmate, voice talk with your new friends in LightChat.

Lightchat is an interactive live streaming app where anyone can meet, chat, and make friends!

Welcome to chat parties lightchat!

Lightchat - popular group chat rooms & online entertaining community. Play games and voice chat with friends. Enjoy with friends all the time!

You do not need to show your face in lightchat, you can participate in various social chats and interactive games with your voice, here where you can meet people from thousands of different places, find same-minded people and become friends, here you may start your story. Every moment here can bring you happiness, because lightchat is an integrated entertainment party APP.

FEATURES:

[Connect all over the world]
We cover global network and let you talk with a lot of interesting people easily.

[Among us voice chat]
Enjoy the voice chat in your own room and share your room with others.

[Multiple fun activities]
Here are many funny activities, such as sing, game.

[Wonderful gifts]
Variety of exquisite gifts, luxury sports cars, beautiful avatar frame and other decorations to choose.

Dear friends, your comments and suggestions are very welcomed, please email us at: thousxepon@gmail.com

title: LightChat -Voice Chat & Meet &

creator: Guangzhou Time Online Network Technology Limited
descriptionHtml:
Lightchat is an interactive live streaming app where anyone can meet, chat, and make friends!

Welcome to chat parties lightchat!

Lightchat - popular group chat rooms & online entertaining community. Play games and voice chat with friends. Enjoy with friends all the time!

You do not need to show your face in lightchat, you can participate in various social chats and interactive games with your voice, here where you can meet people from thousands of different places, find same-minded people and become friends, here you may start your story. Every moment here can bring you happiness, because lightchat is an integrated entertainment party APP.

FEATURES:

[Connect all over the world]
We cover global network and let you talk with a lot of interesting people easily.

[Among us voice chat]
Enjoy the voice chat in your own room and share your room with others.

[Multiple fun activities]
Here are many funny activities, such as sing, game.

[Wonderful gifts]
Variety of exquisite gifts, luxury sports cars, beautiful avatar frame and other decorations to choose.

Dear friends, your comments and suggestions are very welcomed, please email us at: thousxepon@gmail.com

descriptionHtml:
Lightchat is an interactive live streaming app where anyone can meet, chat, and make friends!

Welcome to chat parties lightchat!

Lightchat - popular group chat rooms & online entertaining community. Play games and voice chat with friends. Enjoy with friends all the time!

You do not need to show your face in lightchat, you can participate in various social chats and interactive games with your voice, here where you can meet people from thousands of different places, find same-minded people and become friends, here you may start your story. Every moment here can bring you happiness, because lightchat is an integrated entertainment party APP.

FEATURES:

[Connect all over the world]
We cover global network and let you talk with a lot of interesting people easily.

[Among us voice chat]
Enjoy the voice chat in your own room and share your room with others.

[Multiple fun activities]
Here are many funny activities, such as sing, game.

[Wonderful gifts]
Variety of exquisite gifts, luxury sports cars, beautiful avatar frame and other decorations to choose.

Dear friends, your comments and suggestions are very welcomed, please email us at: thousxepon@gmail.com
